title: 23 garment factory workers injured in bus accident
content: An accident involving two buses left at least 23 garment factory workers injured at Koralaima on Horana-Colombo road this afternoon (23), police said.A bus transporting the garment workers to Kahathuduwa crashed into a SLTB bus from the rear as it had been on its way from Horana to Colombo.None in the SLTB bus sustained injuries.Two of the injured garment workers are in critical condition.Police blame their driver for the incident and have taken him into custody.
